GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
meson-mx-socinfo: Fix refcount leak in meson_mx_socinfo_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 2691b8780f88e1b8b3578a5bc78a0011741bbd74, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit 5e68c0fc8df8a588b15cd469b27b8b5dbfadc6c3. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: meson-mx-socinfo: Fix refcount leak in meson_mx_socinfo_init
